title: A rhodamine-based fluorescent probe bearing 8-hydroxyquinoline group for the highly selective detection of Hg2+ and its practical application in cell imaging
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31861-31867
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06115B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lei Zhang, Jun Guo, Qihua You
A selective OFF–ON fluorescent Hg2+ probe was developed based on a rhodamine platform. The probe exhibits a fast response, low detection limit, and a 1 : 1 binding mode. Furthermore, the probe was used for the sensing of Hg2+ in living cells.
